title: Replace compliance email with support email

requirements.summary: Replace all occurrences of 'compliance@stackteacher.com' with 'support@stackteacher.com' across all frontend source files
acceptanceCriteria: No instance of 'compliance@stackteacher.com' remains anywhere in the frontend source files.
All locations that previously showed 'compliance@stackteacher.com' now display 'support@stackteacher.com'.

file_operations.description: Replace 'compliance@stackteacher.com' with 'support@stackteacher.com' in the Privacy Policy page content where users are instructed to contact for privacy-related inquiries or rights requests.
Replace 'compliance@stackteacher.com' with 'support@stackteacher.com' in the Terms of Use page content where users are directed to contact for legal or policy questions.
Replace 'compliance@stackteacher.com' with 'support@stackteacher.com' in the footer section where contact information is displayed.
